messages.title: Back Me
messages.content: Back me and I will stand up to the EU bureaucrats who are trying to undermine our negotiations and our national interest.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
Deliver economic certainty and security for you and your family.

issues.brexitEurope: Back me and I will stand up to the EU bureaucrats who are trying to undermine our negotiations and our national interest.
issues.economy: Deliver economic certainty and security for you and your family.

quotes.text: THE RISK IS JUST TOO BIG TO TAKE.

quotes.source: Betting markets back THERESA MAY to become PM following the debate

quotes.text: Think Jeremy Corbyn negotiating Brexit is never going to happen?

images.caption: Back me and I will stand up to the EU bureaucrats who are trying to undermine our negotiations and our national interest.
Provide strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
Deliver economic certainty and security for you and your family.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet makes a tactical comparative pitch regarding potential outcomes of the upcoming election, with references to betting markets and opposing candidates, but without specific mention of local strategic voting considerations.
